Scanned with CamScannerYou are my only son. In consideration of the great love I have for you, I hereby grant you the following immovable property worth Rs. 7,26,000-00 in letters, free of charge, and I hereby grant you full possession of the said property with full rights and title. From now on, you shall be the full rightful owner of this settlement property and shall enjoy it freely and happily, paying the Panchayat dues, with the rights of donation, exchange, sale and transfer, as you wish, until your children and grandchildren are born. I understand that in the implementation of the Scheduled Property to you according to this Settlement, I will resolve all disputes, disputes, disputes, etc., at my own expense and I will be able to implement this property to you without any hindrance. I hereby certify that the settlement property is an undisputed property, which has not been transferred to any other person, and that the number, area and boundaries are correct, and that this settlement deed is written and given to you. This property has not been assigned by Shri Gavarsha. It is not a property given as 'D' title under Act 9/77. The settlement property is hereby registered in your name in the Panchayat accounts. Settlement Property Details
Cherukuwada village taluk in Undi Mandal, Undi Sub-district, West Godavari District, Cherukuwada Major Village
Panchayat Area, which is my ancestral property,
and I have full possession of the said land. No.260, No.011/2, or 72.6 sq.m., 3rd block, Door No.3-65, bounded by the R.C.C. Dhaaba constructed therein:-
Onu Narasa Nishan

I hereby declare that the property mentioned in the document be-
longs to me and was not alienated earlier and if it is found to have been
violated the provisions of Section 22B of Registration Act, 1908 I would
be liable for penal action as per Section 82 of Registration Act,1908.
Section 22–B Registration Act - 1908
Declaration
This declaration is to inform that in preparing this document, I/We have taken all the necessary documents such as the details of the property in the document, copies of the land title deeds, tax receipts for the land/houses, details of the parties in the link document, addresses of the parties, photographs of the parties, details of the property etc. and have thoroughly examined all the matters and have included them in this document and have prepared the document. No matter that should have been written or included has been omitted in this document. The schedule property has been physically examined and measured and the document has been drawn up. I/We declare that the said property has not been sold, mortgaged, etc. to anyone else except for the sale to you, that this property is an undisputed property, that there are no dues payable on the said property, and that I/We am/are able to pay the depreciation stamp duty found during the inspection of the said property by the authorities (Registration and Stamps Revenue Department) in the future. I/We have not violated the provisions of Section 22-B of the Registration Act, 1908. And I/We are fully responsible for all other matters. Neither the Sub-Registrar nor the Registrar of Deeds has any connection with it. We are responsible for any and all claims arising out of this sale deed that are not made by the Government, Endowment, Waks Board and
assigned in the future. This is a declaration that we have read/read this document completely and have given our full consent.
Written by

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: C HERUKUW ADA/REST ALL(0-3) WB: 0-3 SURV EY: 260 HO USE: 3-65 E XTENT: 72.6 SQ.Yds BUIL T: 400SQ. F T Boundire s: [N]: WAY SITE IN PEN METSA BHA GAVANRAJ U [S] HOUS E OF KARA CHI NARASI MHAMURT HY [E]: PAN CHAYATHI ROAD [W]: SITE OF PE NMETSA BHAGAVANRA JU

boundaries.boundaryN: Site of Penmetsa Bhagwan Raju Pathway

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 181 of 2026, dated 24/Jan/2026, executed by Onu Narasa in favour of her Son, Onu Yesuraju towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 3-65, Assessment number 485, Block No. 3, comprised in survey number 260, situated in Cherukuwada Village, Cherukuwada Major Grama Panchayathi, Undi Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Undi, is bounded as follows: North by: Site of Penmetsa Bhagwan Raju Pathway South by: House of Karachi Narasimha Murthy East by: Panchayat Road West by: Site of Penmetsa Bhagwan Raju

(A)As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 260, bearing house no. 3-65, situated in Cherukuwada Village, measuring about 72.6 Sq. Yds., was originally owned by Onu Narasa, who acquired the property through Inheritance from her Ancestors. [Ref:Deed] 2. The aforementioned Onu Narasa executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 24/Jan/2026, registered as document No. 181 of 2026, before the SRO Undi in favour of her Son, Onu Yesuraju towards the property measuring 72.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house no. 3-65, comprised in survey no.260, situated at Cherukuwada Village. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt No. 284959, dated 22/Dec/2025, imprinted by the Cherukuwada Panchayath Secretary discloses that Onu Narasa has paid property tax towards house number 3-65. 2. Encumbrance Certificate vide Statement No. 139848618, dated 29/Jan/2026, extracted with respect to the Schedule Property does not reflect any adverse entries, other than those mentioned above.
The HTR attached discloses that Onu Narasa is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Onu Yesuraju.

contentList: Document Name * Document Description * Document Date * Document Type

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Onu Yesuraju, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to the property measuring 72.6 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 3-65, Assessment number 485, Block No. 3, comprised in survey number 260, situated in Cherukuwada Village, Cherukuwada Major Grama Panchayathi, Undi Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Undi.

Note:The report was prepared based on the EC provided by the F.I., as the option to retrieve EC records using the document number & property address parameter is currently unavailable in the Online EC portal. Hence, F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy.
